Class Board

java.lang.Object
Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants
public class Board extends Object implements Constants
Class Board Includes all the methods for the board including: - what characters go where in the board - printing board in a nice format to the terminal - checking if X or O is the winner - checking if the board is full
Author:
bains

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface Constants

    LETTER_O, LETTER_X, SPACE_CHAR

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board()
    Board() Constructor Initializes a 2d array theBoard

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addMark(int row, int col, char mark)
    Method addMark() adds a character (X or O) to a spot on theBoard
    void
    clear()
    Method clear() clears theBoard and specifies all the values in the 2D array to be a space.
    void
    display()
    Method display() Displays theBoard in a nice easy to visualize format.
    char
    getMark(int row, int col)
    Method getMark() returns the value inside a specific spot on the board
    boolean
    isFull()
    Method isFull() returns a true to false depending on if their have been 9 marks placed on the board.
    boolean
    oWins()
    Method oWins() returns true or false if O has won or not.
    boolean
    xWins()
    Method xWins() returns true or false if X has won or not.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Method isFull() returns a true to false depending on if their have been 9 marks placed on the board.
      Returns:
      True or False

      Method xWins() returns true or false if X has won or not.
